synonyms.synonym: Ubiquinol-cytochrome c reductase complex 9.5 kDa protein
Ubiquinol-cytochrome c reductase complex ubiquinone-binding protein QP-C

protein.specific_function: This is a component of the ubiquinol-cytochrome c reductase complex (complex III or cytochrome b-c1 complex), which is part of the mitochondrial respiratory chain. This subunit, together with cytochrome b, binds to ubiquinone

go_class.description: monovalent inorganic cation transmembrane transporter activity
